title: Turning off show summoner names doesn't work

replies.body:
Your config settings may not be getting updated correctly, so try running through these steps to reset them manually and then try changing that setting again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
